headline.main: No Excuses for Ghana Poverty 60 Years After Independence: President
headline.print_headline: No Excuses for Ghana Poverty 60 Years After Independence: President

lead_paragraph: Ghana's President Nana Akufo-Addo said on Monday the country had run out of excuses for failing to end poverty and corruption, 60 years after it became the first in sub-Saharan Africa to win independence from colonial rule.
snippet: Ghana's President Nana Akufo-Addo said on Monday the country had run out of excuses for failing to end poverty and corruption, 60 years after it became the first in sub-Saharan Africa to win independence from colonial rule....
